description: Our Beyond GPT-4V's High Accuracy on USMLE Questions: Observational Study Exposing Hidden Flaws in Clinical Image Interpretation is accepted to Journal of Medical Internet Research (JMIR)!
Our Individual factors that affect laypeople's understanding of definitions of medical jargon is accepted to Health Policy and Technology!
Launching our new website! Please stay tuned for more updates from our group! We will migrate information from the old website , including members, research projects, and publication, etc.
Our Expert-Layperson Agreement paper is accepted to Journal of Medical Internet Research (JMIR)!
Had so much fun in our 3-day group retreat to White Mountain in New Hampshire!
Our PhD student Zhichao Yang (UMass Amherst) succesfully defended his PhD thesis. Congratulation, Dr. Yang!
Our group is recruiting multiple UMass Amherst MS students for 696 Independent Study. Please check the link [CLOSED -- please check during January 2025 for the spring recruitment.].
Welcome our new PhD student in UMass Amherst, Mingchen Li!
Welcome our new student researchers, Jiatan Huang (Lowell) and Siva H (Amherst)!
Our NoteChat paper is accepted to ACL Findings 2024!
Our Automatic Prompt Optimization for Note Generation is accepted to BioNLP 2024!
Welcome back Minhwa Lee for joining our group as a research staff!
Our Clinicalmamba and DermPrompt are accepted to Clinical NLP 2024!
Our LLaMACare and LocalTweets are accepted to LREC-COLING 2024!
